text: Frances de la Tour, also Frances J. de Lautour,GRO Births – SEP 1944 3a 2018 Hemel Hempstead – Frances J. de Lautour, mmn = Fessas (born 30 July 1944) is an English actress. She is known for her role as Miss Ruth Jones in the television sitcom Rising Damp from 1974 until 1978. She is a Tony Award winner and three-time Olivier Award winner. She also played Madame Olympe Maxime in Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (2005). ==References== ==Other websites== * Frances de la Tour's website * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Hertfordshire Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners
title: Frances de la Tour
